synopsis.text: The Sakurai twins, Yukino and Kanade, are inseparable, sharing a dorm room and a special bond that transcends typical sibling affection. Their harmonious life takes an unexpected turn when Sakuya Kamiyama, a fellow student, confesses her feelings for Kanade to Yukino, seeking her support. Meanwhile, Kanade hears rumors of Sakuya's long-standing admiration for Yukino, leading to a whirlwind of misunderstandings and revelations. Amidst this emotional turmoil, Yukino begins to grapple with her own feelings for her twin sister, threatening to disrupt the delicate balance of their relationship. Will their bond survive this complex web of love and confusion, or will it crumble under the weight of unspoken truths?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
